Package io.ib67.astralflow.machines

Record Class MachineContext<T>

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
io.ib67.astralflow.machines.MachineContext<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
Record Components:
reason - Why is that created?
owningPlayer - who created this
owningMachine - who created this
parameter - additional parameter which given by the owning player/holder
public record MachineContext<T>(@NotNull MachineContext.Reason reason, @Nullable org.bukkit.entity.Player owningPlayer, @Nullable IMachine owningMachine, T parameter) extends Record
MachineContext explains why the machine is created and what are involved in.
